nodes.text: it is the young who are the most enthused by the new device.
They know that in today's world the cellphone has the potential of transforming not just inter-personal communication but business and professional prospects.

If a group of ordinary people who wish nothing more than to lead productive lives know that in today's world the cellphone has the potential of transforming not just inter-personal communication but business and professional prospects it is the young among them who are most enthused by the new device.
